content.text:
Here is the memo referring unresolved customer grievances:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
TO: Customer Relations, Technical Support, Billing Departments
FROM: [Your Name], Senior Customer Service Representative
DATE: [Current Date]
SUBJECT: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

The following customer grievances have not been satisfactorily resolved through initial support efforts and require additional investigation by the designated departments:

[Ticket #12345] Customer reports ongoing issues with product defects (Refer to Technical Support)
[Ticket #23456] Customer disputes recurring incorrect charges on their account (Refer to Billing)  
[Ticket #34567] Customer alleges poor treatment by service technician during repair visit (Refer to Customer Relations)

Please review the attached detailed case notes for each grievance. Investigate the issues raised, take appropriate corrective actions, and provide the customers with a resolution or response within 5 business days. Update the ticket status in the CRM system.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these unresolved customer matters. Providing excellent service to address their concerns is our top priority. Let me know if you need any additional information from my initial correspondence with the customers.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
